---

**6D063-234513 Gel Imager**
==========================

**Solicitation Number:** WS4234172057
------------

**Public Tender Notice**
-----------------------

**Title:** Request for Proposal (RFP) - Gel Imager
-------------

**Date:** October 18, 2023
------------

**Closing Date and Time:** November 17, 2023, 14:00 EST
-------------

**Amendment Number:** 2
------------

**Scope of Work:**
----------------

The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) is seeking a contract for the supply, delivery, and installation of a Gel Imager to the Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC).

**Key Requirements:**
-----------------

* Supply, deliver, and install a Gel Imager
* Meeting specified medical imaging processing equipment and supplies requirements
* Complying with Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA) and other applicable trade agreements

**Evaluation Criteria:**
---------------------

* Lowest price
* Compliance with the terms and conditions of the tender

**Tender Documents:**
-----------------

The complete tender documentation, including the technical and commercial requirements, is available on the Ariba Discovery platform.

**Additional Information:**
----------------------

For any queries or comments, please contact:

Lee, Oana (SPAC/PSPC)
Oana.lee@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
-------------- [https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17759296?extsite=MTc3NTkyOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17759296?extsite=MTc3NTkyOTZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

**Attachments:**
---------------- None

**_Important:** _Please note that this tender is subject to the Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement and other applicable trade agreements. Respondents are expected to comply with all relevant provisions.
